website_summaries.verdict: Works to clean almost any surface safely while delivering a pleasant orange smell.
pros: All-natural concentration that cleans nearly any type of material, including oily and greasy residues
Available in a large bottle size, so you'll have plenty of solution on hand any time you need it
cons: Some problems with quality control, as bottles will occasionally arrive with damage

customer_reviews.title: Best all purpose cleaning solution EVER AND it's natural!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Citra Solv for 20 years. It is a wonderful natural product that I use for every household job from cleaning the bathroom to walls to non wood floors to the garage door, removing dirt, mildew whatever to prepping the walls before painting. You don't need much. Suggestion: using a toothpick poke several holes in the top of the paper seal instead of removing it. This way you can spray a smaller amount into the container your using...instead of glugging it in and using too much.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful stuff
customer_reviews.text: A few months ago we discovered the amazing cleansing and polishing properties of pure orange oil. Since the real stuff is incredibly expensive, we needed something for more everyday use and this stuff works well. It contains enough orange oil to kill pet odors and to leave floors smelling clean and fresh. It doesn't impart the same shine as the real stuff, but if you think of this as a lower-cost filler for everyday use, it is great. We've bought this item repeatedly and will continue to do so as long as the manufacturer doesn't change its formula and messes up the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cambridge Living

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product cleans everything. I put it on my mirrors full strength and then washed them. It took all the film off them. I saturate a rag with it and put it in the washer with dirty work clothes. They come out clean and fresh. It is also good for spot cleaning clothes. No matter what I use it on, it makes the whole house smell wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works miracles!
customer_reviews.text: Citrasolv is the ONLY thing to use if you want to clean anything sticky. And the great news is that it is all natural and nontoxic!!! It has a lovely orange scent (it’s basically orange oil). It will get paint off smooth surfaces (not so great on porous surfaces like brick, etc.). I ALWAYS have this on hand. Other similar products may work as well, but when you use them you feel like you’re breathing something toxic. (Because you are). USE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie J

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle but...
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. Smells great works even better. Be careful to test a small area when going straight strength. A bottle lasts me up to 6 months and we use it all the time. Price is too high. Can’t find it in my local Whole Foods anymore and the raised the price here a few dollars. Going to try some more reasonable prices from other brands in hopes of getting both quality and Value.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner for sticky grease on all surfaces except some plastic
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaner for sticky grease on all surfaces except some plastic. Takes all stick grease off of range hood interior, finger prints on cabinets, and great for cleaning litter boxes. Just take care in getting on some plastics, it etches. Like the plastic water reservoir of the Keurig coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Nikitasectionone

customer_reviews.title: You must love the scent of Oranges. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this product!!!! I am very picky about the products I use around my animals and children. Some have health issues. This product is worth every penny! Leaves no residue, but the fresh scent of real oranges. Originally I purchased for a craft project, it is now a household staple just like my Briggs cider vinegar. Can’t live without these wonderful products.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: it must be an awesome cleaner but I haven't used it as such
customer_reviews.text: Use it in my artwork. If it dissolves printed ink and oil paint, it must be an awesome cleaner but I haven't used it as such. Smells good but artists warn other artists that it can be toxic and to use gloves and a respirator but I used it without those things before I received the warning and I think I am ok (my friends and family may not agree but at least there is nothing visibly out of the ordinary - no green scales etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Barb D.

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner ever
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for many years, the best cleaner ever. Diluted in sprayer works as well as anything else out there, but smells divine! In concentrate, will cut through the worst grease and grime. You can do the whole house and not feel sick from it like more conventional products. I have told so many people about this stuff, I sometimes sound like a commercial.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Product But
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5 star - Love this for cleaning my kitchen instead of harmful chemicals BUY tried to refill my spray bottle (same product) and screw off cap is Horrible, doesn't seal right once opened. Really for the money this company could make a a cap spray bottle that can be refilled. Now I have to go buy some big spray bottle to use this purchase???
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: This product works fantastic I mix it with a degreaser. But it is very expensive. I clean houses and we go through a lot works in every room. Just wish the price wasn't so ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Dora Leite

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this. I buy it all the Tim and I always leave 5 stars! It's the schizzle. Don't buy the other knock offs, but be careful, it's serious surfactant! Natural doesn't equal weak or neccessiarly safe. It will remove your skin at full strength! As well as all the grease in your kitchen! We like the other bergamot scent too.
customer_reviews.author: A Uni

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a medium to smooth the oil paint and to mix colors and I use it as a solvent to clean my brushes and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: I am an amateur artist painting in oils and I use this as a substitute for the turpenoids I have been using. I use it as a medium to smooth the oil paint and to mix colors and I use it as a solvent to clean my brushes and it works great. It also smells nice and is not harmful to our environment!
customer_reviews.author: Keith H.

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing while wet.
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing - wish it lasted longer. I love this stuff. Cleans well, smells great - only wish is the scent had more staying power because it’s amazing. I have dark wood floors so it’s hard to see clean compared to dirty, but they do not appear to have any film and do look clean after. Not shiny like an oil but nicely cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: jessdsn

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this works. Put it on a spongue and it will remove the bathtub ring with out any hard scrubbing. It smells great, and works really well. It is natural so there aren't harsh chemicals to make you sick.
customer_reviews.author: klstudios

customer_reviews.title: Excellent natural alternative to damaging harsh chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: As I wish to be environmentally friendly, towards my planet, I am willing to frequently purchase this instead of products with harsh chemicals, that could potentially cause damage to this planet of mine. Catherine Mary Margaret Tatlock- Lindenhurst, Long Island, New York, U.S.A.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mary Margaret Tatlock

customer_reviews.title: Mild citrus scent
customer_reviews.text: I love cleaning with citrus solve. I love the mild orange scent and it does leave a dry surface on wood surfaces.. dilute in water and clean up the whole house!
customer_reviews.author: annabella

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner, it cleans well & smells good. It is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Floor cleaner that works and smells great without funky chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: Nice naturally orange scent! Works great on my limestone floors, and no need to worry about pets and children as this is not a chemical laden toxic cleaner. This dish soap is awesome too!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. If you have kids who leave stickers on their clothes (mine all the time) and you have not discovered it until after you have both washed and dried the shirt, well no worries. Take a small amount of this put it on the area, rub, rinse and wash the item again and the sticker is gone. Great stain remover too especially for grease.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart1999

customer_reviews.title: I like the fresh citrus scent, works well on countertops & on my bikes' drivetrains
customer_reviews.text: I feel good about using a natural cleaner, and I definitely like the generous size of this concentrate, so I can easily refill my squirt bottles which I use for wiping-down the countertops. I like the fresh, citrus scent. And I also pour a capful in a hot bucket of water to clean the drivetrain on my bikes.
customer_reviews.author: SUMMER R.

customer_reviews.title: Safe Effective Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Very safe (for pets and around food) and effective cleaner. Pricey but a little goes a long way for around the house, basement , car, windows, floors ... and smells sooo good.
customer_reviews.author: JODsatch

customer_reviews.title: Just the best cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner can be used many ways. Does the best cleaning of any product for household use and it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: blhersey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love Cirtrasolv and have been using it for years! Use it on floors, walls, windows, and just about anywhere. Pleasant order that my husband can tolerate too!
customer_reviews.author: Citsirose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Citra Solve Cleaner for many years. I love the way it smells. Any odors are gone after I clean with Citra Solve. It is a natural cleaner, so no harsh chemicals. Although it is expensive, I think it is worth the cost. I use just a little in my sprayer, adding hot water. Wonderful stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: truthlover

customer_reviews.title: It came without a lid!!
customer_reviews.text: This came without a lid. How am I supposed to use it when I can't close It? The only thing on top of it is the tamper proof seal. Once the seal comes off, I can't close it. What the heck!!??
customer_reviews.author: MBH

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It cleans almost everything, and smells wonderful, no artificial stuff added to it. If I need to disinfect, I use bleach, and I do use ammonia for windows, but this is my main cleaning solution. It will also kill ants and other critters if I need to. Be careful around pets and kids, it is strong, and will burn eyes and skin if the solution contacts them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Wrangler

customer_reviews.title: Citri solve is the best
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cleaner. It even completely annihilates cat urine! It decreases cleans and smells wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Terra Khemiri

customer_reviews.title: Our go-to cleaning product
customer_reviews.text: Our household has been cleaning with Citra Solve for over 20 years. It does the job and leaves a fresh citrus scent. We have purchased other products from time to time but always come back to Citra Solve. It is our number one general purpose cleaning product
customer_reviews.author: Cspepper

customer_reviews.title: Cleans damned near anything.
customer_reviews.text: I make a spray out of it that I use to degrease my kitchen. Also works very well as a laundry booster to get musty mildew smells out of fabric. If you cut it with vinegar, it degreases even more thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Phil & Liz

customer_reviews.title: Long time user ...
customer_reviews.text: While this particular bottle of CitraSolv has not yet arrived, I have been using the product for many years. Takes care of marks and gunk ... like nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Retired4Mexico

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great I've been able to get out wine stains and grease stains out of clothes with this product. Also have gotten set in stains in the carpet with this product. I have also bought this for my mom to use and she loves.
customer_reviews.author: TheBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Type A approved
customer_reviews.text: If you care about clean, you already own this magic potion--it is the not bleach-bleach. It strips goo, grime, and nasty smells right out, and it's so concentrated a bottle lasts almost a year. Get it now and clean everything...because it's not reslly clean til you Citra Solv it,
customer_reviews.author: Bridgetown Mama

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have the blessing/curse of excellence in all my endeavors. This product, which I have used for greater than 10 years, is an example of excellence. Use this powerful, great smelling, and universal cleaner to work on your toughest cleaning tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F. Tool Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Citra solv multi use wonder!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this for her art projects- image transfer and altering magazine images to create altered paper. She loves it. I'm going to try it as a cleaner. (lol)
customer_reviews.author: xelaszym

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cleaner & highly recommend it. We use it in our all purpose cleaner & in our floor cleaner. Great packaging & fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Prouduct; I Love ❤️ it!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well and has a great scent. Bought it after my hair stylist used it in her salon.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!! This stuff is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This makes cleaning easy!! It takes grease out of my husbands work jeans better than Anything I have tried before. It is great on more things than I can name. If you are thinking about ordering this, do it. It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: T McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific and safe cleaner. Have used for years, and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Nasty Jack Nasty

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is really fun stuff! I works as a solvent on Nat Geo magazines and creates an extremely textured and beautiful background on the pictures. I understand this is due to the Nat Geo printing process.
customer_reviews.author: Decolin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for cleaning wax
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaner for removing wax from things. I am an esthetician and I wax for a living and this stuff has SAVED my floors, counters, etc. It smells delicious too, so that's a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey P

customer_reviews.title: Cleans EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaner! I it is my go to cleaner for basically everything and doesn't overwhelm you with fumes like regular cleaners. This is a concentrated bottle which means it lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J.

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic cleaning product. Removes gunk from floor tile grout, which almost nothing I've used in the past would budge. Hard to find the concentrate in local stores, so very happy to have an online alternative.
customer_reviews.author: GDJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking spots out if clothes during pre wash.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I find this works very well diluted and love to know that I have a non toxic cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Holly B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: YOU JUST CAN'T BEAT THIS PRODUCT TO CLEAN EVERYTHING AND LOVE THE PLEASANT SMELL INSTEAD OF CHEMICALS. I DILUTE IT IN A SPRAY BOTTLE WITH WATER FOR EVERYDAY USE. HAVE USED THIS PRODUCT FOR A LONG TIME....THE BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Arcon

customer_reviews.title: Great on grease, oil, and ink
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a great all-purpose cleaner. Use it full strength for grease, oil, and ink. Plus I love the citrus smell. I've been using Citra-Solv for many years and have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Citra-Solv
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Citra-Solv for years and love its versatility, scent, and most of all the natural ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very effective degreaser.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very effective degreaser with a pleasant citrus orange smell. I have been using it for 15 years. It can melt some plasiics when used undiluted so use caution and test first.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Uses natural oils.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite cleaners. The scent is amazing and I love that it’s natural.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ellingsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best if not the best degreaser out there. Takes on the toughest jobs and has a great smell
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH

customer_reviews.title: Received it yesterday and it did a fantastic job on my floors
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday and it did a fantastic job on my floors. I think I found what I have been looking for for the last 40 years (the perfect cleaner)
customer_reviews.author: Terri Theryoung

customer_reviews.title: My go-to solvent cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Undiluted this stuff takes off labels and goo better than anything else. It also works well heavily diluted as a multi purpose cleaner. Plus, it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: texase

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This has a nice smell and cuts grease well. The bottle is pricey but it makes a lot. I used it to clean my waxing rags used when chalk painting and they are very greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Best for years
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years and it just always works...glass (diluted very much), floors, toilets....and the house smells so good afterward. It's the only cleaner, other than Bar Keepers Friend that I use.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: this cleaner is really great at getting grease out of your white clothes and also has many other useful cleaning jobs that can be done with this awesome smelling Valencia orange smelling product.
customer_reviews.author: JOE DOE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to leave a ring around areas when I use it as pre-treatment washing my clothes
customer_reviews.author: brian t cody

customer_reviews.title: Love Citra Solv
customer_reviews.text: I cannot live without Citra Solv. I've been using this brand for years. I love the smell of citrus and it's pretty potent. I'm pretty detailed on keeping the kitchen clean and having a clean sink. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Pinipeg

customer_reviews.title: Great degreaser!
customer_reviews.text: Best product for removing grease stains even old set in ones just spray and throw in washing machine no presoaking or waiting!!
customer_reviews.author: LML

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This product really lifts oil stains out of the laundry! And unlike another product I've tried, its orange scent is not disturbing nor does it linger.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaJoy

customer_reviews.title: Great way to clean & debug your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This stuff can be used to clean and it is also a nontoxic food-safe pesticide!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Citra Solv happily for many years. Whole Foods no longer carries it so am glad be able to get it through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: i use this cleaner mainly as a spot remover in the laundry, it works fantastic for getting cooking oil stains out of clothes even after they have been washed, can not be without this product.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES E DOTSON

customer_reviews.title: Citra Solve
customer_reviews.text: My bottle arrived cracked and leaking but able to find some locally. This stuff works great, give a nice shimmer and smells fresh. It def gets that grime and crust off well.
customer_reviews.author: AlphaWave

customer_reviews.title: You can use it full strength or diluted.
customer_reviews.text: Best natural cleaner for dirt and grime. Works on stain on Clothes too.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner! Works great and smells so good! I will buy it again and again. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Clement E. Farnham

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good product which I have used for years. Works well on all problem stains. The best price was from this seller. Thanks for the fast shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Victorm

customer_reviews.title: restore paint brushes used for oils, clear printing ink ...
customer_reviews.text: restore paint brushes used for oils, clear printing ink off of etching plates in a snap, remove stains from clothing. This stuff seems to do it all.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST HOUSEHOLD ITEM IN THE WORLD
customer_reviews.text: USE ON LAUNDRY THAT HAS STAINS...USE FOR PET CLEAN UPS....USE TO CUT GREASE FROM GRILLS (SOAK IN MIXTURE OF CITRA SOLVE AND WATER) .... SMELLS GREAT, AND YOU CAN'T BEAT HOW WELL IT CLEANS! I WOULD BE LOST WITHOUT IT!!
customer_reviews.author: CAITLIN

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Citra Solv for years, long before citrus based cleaners became commonplace. Always have gotten great results so why buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful but ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not remove the baked on grease on my wood pellet grill. I will use it for lighter cleaning. Nice fresh odor.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff and it's so hard to find locally
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and it's so hard to find locally. I've used it for decades. It removes labels, black scuffs from linoleum floors, cleans and has a lovely citrus scent. I recently used it to remove tar and nicotine stains from an old sewing machine I had purchased. It cleaned without damaging the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful!! It does a great job on our ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful!! It does a great job on our wood floors and cupboards. The house smells like citrus after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best degreaser in the world. Gets stubborn glue off surfaces too. Very strong cleaning but environmentally safe.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dean

customer_reviews.title: my hood inside over the stove is shining like new.
customer_reviews.text: Realy removes all the greas. my hood inside over the stove is shining like new.
customer_reviews.author: Nattie fino

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it for everything: cleaning, laundry (fabulous for removing stains), etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cleaners I have ever used! The wonderful citrus smell lasts for a couple of days!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff ! Awesome for distressing paper for my artwork !
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Citrosolv great product
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well for degreasing kitchen grease. I buy this product over and over wonderful citrus smell and easy to wash off your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Eiting

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I was able to removed cartilage powder ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was able to removed cartilage powder from a light blue short. The short looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Cockatiel

customer_reviews.title: Great product that has stood the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: Versatile product that isn't as easy to find locally as it once was. Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: S.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Best all around cleaner. One cap in soapy hot water to clean the entire kitchen. Great on the granite. N
customer_reviews.author: Beth L Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Why I LOve Citra Solve
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it is the best as a degreaser, the smell is fresh and clean and doesn't irrate my nose or eyes nor cause breathing problems as other products I've used does. I use this for cleaning my tile floors and it does the job without leaving that sticky feeling when I walk on it. I could go on about the many uses of Citra Solve , I will just say it is my go to for many house hold cleaning jobs.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love, love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love, love this product. Been using it for years. Get many compliments about the amazing way my house smells when I use it to clean. It cleans beautifully, it smells great and is economical, too. I also put a few drops full strength into the toilet bowls to refresh the bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Have used Citra Solv for years. Like the cleaning power and the orange scent
customer_reviews.author: the Flying Noun

customer_reviews.title: Base for most of my cleaning solutions
customer_reviews.text: My dad has been using Cirtrasolv as a heavy duty degreaser for years for construction applications. When I wanted to start using more natural cleaning supplies, Citrasolv concentrate quickly became a must have base for my cleaning solutions. The bottle gives you ratios for concentrate to water depending on your application. I always have this in the house and was glad to find it through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cleaning product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have been using it for years. One of it many uses is that it removes greasey spots from clothes. It smells really good and you use it so sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: netnet

customer_reviews.title: Best Degreaser
customer_reviews.text: Best, degreaser I ever tried! Cleans wax within seconds! and smells amazing! it is very concentrate so a little bit goes a long away! Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Heath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great smelling, cleans well great on oil based stains or glue
customer_reviews.author: Frank Dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: The wonderful aroma of Citra Solv
customer_reviews.text: Citra Solve Natural Cleaner & Degreaser is a wonderful product as an air freshner, if nothing else! I am an artist, and purchased this product strictly for an art project, so my evaluation may not be useful to you. I have my art studio in my home, but I also have a craft corner in my garage. I chose to experiment with the Citra Solve out in the garage, and the lasting aroma is marvelous out there - I love it. Now I must test it's cleaning ability. I do not regret ordering this product for one minute, and I will order it again when this runs out.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good cleaner for sticky stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Works well cleaining remaining glue from contact paper. Also a lot of stains and marks left on items like floors and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Gammel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a favorite. It also smells nice. Not like those awful chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia P.

customer_reviews.title: Best degreaser I have ever found
customer_reviews.text: Best degreaser I have ever found. Love this product it works extremely well and is enviromental friendly. Best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product work as directed. Definitely good on tough stains and easy on delicate surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Salter

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful product. It smells very fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful product. It smells very fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grease is gone.
customer_reviews.text: The product works very well. Best degreaser I've used to date.
customer_reviews.author: david.a

customer_reviews.title: Smells great cleans everything
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and cleans everything. Doesn't smell like chemicals. At full strength this product is great at getting stick-um off.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: Used for years. Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for several years. It is so versitile. I use it for floors, cleaning my car, and everything in between.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Citra Solve is the best cleaner I have ever used - hands down! Smells great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Citra Solv has been one of my favorite cleaners for years
customer_reviews.text: Citra Solv has been one of my favorite cleaners for years, it's powerful, and it smells divine, everybody loves the smell of my house after I clean w/CitraSolv. The only thing you need to watch-out for, is that it is truly a solvent, and it will damage plastics, ie make them "gummy," if you put it directly on full-strength, so dilute it properly for cleaning. If you need to use a solvent to get rid of something like mineral scale on plastic, use white vinegar. It is not a bleach of any kind, fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Walker

product_meta.title: Citra Solv Food, 32 Ounce, Colorless, 32 Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:32 OunceThe product that started it all! Super-concentrated natural cleaner that harnesses the power of orange extractives to work cut through virtually every type of grease and grime. Hundreds of uses at various dilutions. Available as a super-concentrate or in a ready-to-use, general-purpose dilution.Powerful all natural cleaner, easily biodegrades.Never tested on animals.Leaves a fresh clean orange scent
feature_bullets: Description: CITRA-SOLV NATURAL SOLVN Size: 32 OZ Brand: CITRA
